name: Aqua Bomb Home & Away Set
about: What it is: A set featuring the bestselling moisturizer that’s climate tested to deliver lasting hydration for a radiant glow wherever you go...Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily..Skincare Concerns: Dryness, Dullness, and Uneven Texture..Formulation: Gel..Highlighted Ingredients:- Hyaluronic Acid: Delivers intense hydration..- Niacinamide: Gently exfoliates dead skin cells..- Napiers Original and Aqua Herbal Formulas: Help skin feel fresh and moisturized...Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, phthalates, mineral oil, sulfates SLS & SLES, and contain less than one percent synthetic fragrance...What Else You Need to Know: This duo features our iconic Korean facial gel cream in two giftable sizes. Lightweight and fast absorbing, The True Cream Aqua Bomb delivers intense and fast hydration to ten layers of the skin in as little as ten seconds after application. This formula is dermatologically tested...This Set Contains:- 1.69 oz/ 50 mL The True Cream Aqua Bomb (full size).- 0.84 oz/ 25 mL The True Cream Aqua Bomb (mini size)..Clinical Results: In climate tests in four conditions, results show:.- The True Cream Aqua Bomb delivers intense hydration that will keep your skin aglow wherever you go..In a survey of 30 subjects:.- 100% agreed that skin was hydrated immediately and visibly replenished..In a clinical test, results showed:.- A 231.4% rapid increase in skin hydration level
ingredients: -Hyaluronic Acid: Delivers intense hydration..-Niacinamide: Gently exfoliates dead skin cells. .-Napiers Original and Aqua Herbal Formulas: Help skin feel fresh and moisturized. ..Water/Eau, Dipropylene Glycol, Glycerin, Methyl Trimethicone, Alcohol Denat., Dimethicone, Cyclopentasiloxane, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, PEG/PPG/Polybutylene Glycol-8/5/3 Glycerin, Pentaerythrityl Tetraethylhexanoate, Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Extract, Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract, Nepeta Cataria Extract, Rubus Idaeus (Raspberry) Leaf Extract, Baptisia Tinctoria Root Extract, Stellaria Media (Chickweed) Extract, Alchemilla Vulgaris Leaf Extract, Equisetum Arvense Leaf Extract, Urtica Dioica (Nettle) Leaf Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Niacinamide, Polymethylsilsesquioxane, Panthenol, PEG-150, Pentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate, Phenyl Trimethicone, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Carbomer, Tromethamine, Squalane, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Dimethiconol, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, C14-22 Alcohols, Polysorbate 60, Butylene Glycol, Macadamia Ternifolia Seed Oil, Malachite Extract, Triethylhexanoin, Trisodium EDTA, Arachidyl Glucoside, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Sorbitan Isostearate, Glyceryl Stearate, Stearic Acid, Ceramide NP, Cholesterol, PEG-100 Stearate, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Oil, Citrus Aurantifolia (Lime) Oil , Pelargonium Graveolens Flower Oil , Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Oil, Citral , Citronellol , Limonene, Geraniol, Linalool.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-After cleansing and toning, apply a dime-size amount or more to skin with a gentle patting motion..-The moisturizer can be used daily, morning and night...Precautions:.-Discontinue use if irritation or a rash occurs..-Consult a physician if irritation persists..-Do not use on broken or damaged skin..-Avoid the eye area..-Keep out of reach of children..-Do not store at extreme temperatures or in direct sunlight..-For external use only.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer is definitely a mixed experience for me. On the positive side, it's incredibly hydrating and provides a nice cooling effect, which feels great on the skin. The formula really locks in moisture, making it an excellent choice for anyone with dry skin, especially during the colder months. I think this will be a fantastic winter moisturizer when my skin needs that extra level of hydration. However, this product is not suited for sensitive skin. The first time I tried it, I was experiencing a flare up and it burned those areas, which made me hesitant to try it again. Initially, I handed it over to my mom, who found it soothing and really enjoyed it, so I decided to give it another shot. Surprisingly, the second time around was much better, and I didn’t have the same negative reaction. Another thing to note is the strong fragrance. While it’s pleasant, it can be a bit overpowering, which might not be ideal for those who are sensitive to scents. Overall, this moisturizer works well for deep hydration, but it may not be the best option for those with reactive or fragrance-sensitive skin. Gifted by Igbeauty

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The gel-based texture feels lightweight, absorbs quickly, and leaves my skin feeling instantly refreshed and plump. The travel-sized version is a lifesaver for trips, making it easy to stick to my skincare routine without lugging around large containers. It’s lightweight and layered well under my makeup throughout the day. Overall, the Aqua Bomb is an excellent choice if you’re looking for a lightweight yet hydrating solution for everyday use, especially with the convenience of the Home & Away set. Gifted by Lg Beauty

The belif Aqua Bomb Home & Away Set is a convenient skincare kit that includes full and travel-sized versions of the brand’s infamous Aqua Bomb moisturizer.   Known for its lightweight, gel-like texture, this product is a cult favorite and delivers instant hydration. My oily skin loves this moisturizer because it hydrates and soothes without leaving my skin feeling greasy.   The set is perfect for on-the-go hydration, with both at-home and travel-sized options to keep my skin moisturized at all times.  Overall, the belif Aqua Bomb Home & Away Set is an excellent choice for anyone looking for lightweight hydration for their normal to oily skin.   This product with gifted by lgbeauty in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_text: Loving this face moisturizer! I actually got a larger sample of the body lotion and loved it, so I was really excited when I got to try this out for free gifted by lgbeauty! The double set is super helpful if you like to travel. The smaller container is easily transported during travel which is a great bonus and I can imagine myself reusing it after it’s empty for future trips. So this moisturizer has some great features! It has a peptide in it and ceramide np which is a great barrier supporting ingredient. It felt like it kept its consistency even with my 30% glycerin serum underneath it. I’ve noticed sometimes my moisturizers tend to break down when the face is damp with product. This did not! It’s definitely a dewy finish which I don’t like on me, but I use a primer that mattifies the dewiness and it’s perfect. I run on the normal to drier side and this doesn’t feel heavy even those it’s a thicker gel consistency. It’s not going to slide down your skin while applying. It sits beautifully under makeup and would be a solid choice to a skincare regimen. The biggest thing I noticed is that is felt really neutral. It’s not trying to do too much, the smell is faint but clean and it didn’t irritate my sensitive eyes. I’m really enjoying this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by Belif the Aqua Bomb Home and Away Set. The set includes a full-size and a travel-size version of the popular True Cream Aqua Bomb and is a fantastic skincare package for those seeking hydration, whether at home or on the go.   True Cream Aqua Bomb (Full-size & Travel-size) known for its gel-cream texture that provides a cooling burst of hydration. It's ideal for normal, oily, and combination skin, leaving it soft, supple, and refreshed without feeling greasy or heavy. The product has a light scent, which may not suit people sensitive to fragrances.  The travel size is very convenient for those who needs hydration on the go as you can easily slip them into your carry-on or gym bag without taking up too much space.    Due to the gel base of the product, I don’t belive it will work for everyone. While it delivers deep hydration, those with extremely dry skin might find they need a more heavy-duty cream.  Overall, the Belif Aqua Bomb Home and Away Set offers a convenient and hydrating skincare routine with quality products. It’s a great choice for those who want to maintain healthy, hydrated skin wherever they go.

No more worrying about dry patches or my skin feeling tight on flights keeping my skin hydrated and glowing even in harsh environments. The fact that it’s climate tested really shows because it holds up in both hot and cold conditions, making it ideal for year-round use.  Another thing I love is how smooth and even my skin texture has become. After using it consistently, I’ve noticed a visible improvement in how soft and radiant my skin looks. It also sits well under makeup. Overall, if you’re looking for a moisturizer that delivers serious hydration without feeling heavy or clogging your pores, this set is amazing. reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm a huge fan of Belif products! I actually have Belif moisturizers in every size they offer from the sample up to the jumbo. The two in the set are the mini and the regular (the middle two sizes available, I'll attach a pic for comparison) and they last a good while, especially if you're only using once per day. I have a 25ml size from a previous use that lasted me a couple months with twice daily use.   I have combo skin and normally use the moisturizing bomb at night and during the winter; the aqua bomb is a lighter more gel type and more suited to normal-to-oily skin (like mine during the summer months) and daytime wear. It's kind of similar to the Trader Joe's jarred moisturizer if you've tried that one, but imo this is a little more moisturizing.  The jars are a little annoying because they're extra bulky for no reason--the product 'area' is all straight down from the raised part of the cap, but the side walls of the jar are extra thick and make it look like you'll have to wedge your finger underneath the opening even though that's not true. They are super sturdy though and can be dropped without breaking or spilling, and the lids are easy to get securely closed without issue. I've never had any of them go bad and I've been using both moisturizers for about a year now; I use them every day but as tubs that you have to dip your fingers into it's nice to not have to worry about a product being too 'clean' in its ingredients to its detriment.   It does have fragrance, which I believe is a change from the original formulation. I've only ever used this new version, but I've never gotten any irritation or breakouts from it.

reviews.review_text: This is a really great set for those who are big fans of this moisturizer! So you are getting a 33% off discount as the value here is accurate at $60 retail.  As for the moisturizer itself, what I have always appreciated about this product is how well it wears under makeup. It never pills, and instead always makes my base look even better. This applies both for wearing under makeup as well as under sunscreen! I had never realized until I read through the description that this product is climate tested - but I must say, that makes sense. It's really a very reliable product!  Keep in mind that this is not a fragrance-free product (so patch test if you do have sensitive skin), but for those who enjoy fragrance, that is A-OK. I find the scent to be quite refreshing. It's perfect for all skin types, including oily and combination skin. The set’s value is exceptional, offering both a full-size and a travel-sized version of the Aqua Bomb, making it convenient for those on the go. The moisturizer is enriched with a blend of herbal ingredients, including Lady’s Mantle, which helps to soothe and protect the skin, ensuring it stays hydrated throughout the day. Users will appreciate how quickly it absorbs and its ability to leave the skin feeling refreshed and plump. It's also versatile enough to layer under makeup or use as a nighttime treatment. The packaging is sleek and practical, and the travel size is ideal for slipping into your bag. Overall, the Belief Aqua Bomb Home & Away Set is a fantastic investment for anyone looking to maintain hydrated, glowing skin while traveling or at home. Its performance and convenience make it a standout choice.

reviews.review_title: Belif Aqua Bomb Home & Away set: My honest review
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have recently received the Aqua Bomb Home & Away Set as a complimentary from Sephora.  The Belif Aqua Bomb Home & Away Set is a highly recommended product for individuals seeking intense hydration and a radiant complexion. This set includes two full-sized versions of the renowned Aqua Bomb moisturizer, making it suitable for both home and travel use.  **Key features:**  * **Intense hydration:** Provides long-lasting moisture and enhances skin plumpness. * **Lightweight texture:** Absorbs swiftly without leaving a greasy residue. * **Soothing and calming:** Aids in reducing redness and irritation. * **Travel-friendly:** The smaller size is ideal for carrying in your handbag or luggage.  **Overall impression:**  The Belif Aqua Bomb Home & Away Set is an excellent investment for individuals with dry or dehydrated skin. Its lightweight formula and exceptional hydration make it a remarkable product in the skincare industry.
